snippet.title: FLITSPIRE (PC DEMO ANNOUNCEMENT) TRAILER
snippet.description:
Flitspire is a Tower-Climbing Action-Platformer for PC. Players use the power of flight combined with an assortment of random weapons to fly to the top of a tower as fast as possible!

Think Downwell x Castlevania x Flappy Bird!

Try the demo for free at:
https://liamedwards.itch.io/flitspire

Follow Liam on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/LiamBME

Music created by:
https://soundcloud.com/windmills-at-dawn
